summary: A unit‑test suite that validates the Qwen2 model's tokenization logic, checking Unicode NFC normalization, handling of pre‑tokenized inputs, full tokenization flow, decoding of special tokens, and integration between Python and Rust tokenizer implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and consistent tokenization for the Qwen2 language model to support reliable downstream NLP applications and prevent regressions in multilingual text processing.
